title: Getting started
text: bunddev provides small registry public APIs helpers explore OpenAPI specifications. APIs enforce rate limits; check registry details service-specific guidance. API-specific helpers return tidy tibbles default. Use bunddev_call() raw responses. flatten = TRUE, set flatten_mode ‚Äújson‚Äù (default), ‚Äúdrop‚Äù, ‚Äúunnest‚Äù. Note ‚Äúunnest‚Äù expands list-columns multiple rows. Use bunddev_parameters("<api>") see currently valid parameters API upstream spec changed. endpoint-specific enums, use bunddev_parameter_values(smard_timeseries, "resolution"). Several adapters add parsed POSIXct time columns (suffix _time) using Europe/Berlin timezone (example time SMARD, start_time DWD, date_time Tagesschau). package separates core OpenAPI layer adapter helpers specific APIs.

code: bunddev_auth_set(   api,   type = "api_key",   env_var,   scheme = NULL,   oauth_url = NULL,   oauth_secret_env = NULL,   oauth_default_id = NULL,   oauth_token_header = "OAuthAccessToken",   oauth_fallback_header = "X-API-Key" )

title: Set authentication configuration for an API ‚Äî bunddev_auth_set
text: api Registry id. type Authentication type ("none", "api_key", "oauth2"). env_var Environment variable containing credentials (api_key) client ID (oauth2). scheme Authentication scheme used Authorization header (e.g., "Bearer", "ApiKey", "OAuth"). oauth_url OAuth2 token endpoint URL (oauth2 type). oauth_secret_env OAuth2 client secret environment variable (oauth2 type). oauth_default_id Default OAuth2 client ID env_var set (oauth2 type). oauth_token_header Header name OAuth token (default "OAuthAccessToken"). oauth_fallback_header Header name secret available (default "X-API-Key").

title: Set authentication configuration for an API ‚Äî bunddev_auth_set
text: updated auth configuration.

title: Set authentication configuration for an API ‚Äî bunddev_auth_set
text: Store auth configuration used bunddev_call() adapter helpers. API key auth: set env_var name environment variable containing key. key sent Authorization: {scheme} <key>. OAuth2 client credentials: set oauth_url token endpoint, env_var client ID env var, oauth_secret_env client secret env var. secret available, fetches OAuth token; otherwise falls back sending client ID API key.

title: Set authentication configuration for an API ‚Äî bunddev_auth_set
code: # API key authentication Sys.setenv(JOBBOERSE_API_KEY = "jobboerse-jobsuche") bunddev_auth_set("jobsuche", type = "api_key", env_var = "JOBBOERSE_API_KEY", scheme = "X-API-Key") #> $type #> [1] "api_key" #>  #> $env_var #> [1] "JOBBOERSE_API_KEY" #>  #> $scheme #> [1] "X-API-Key" #>  #> $oauth_url #> NULL #>  #> $oauth_secret_env #> NULL #>  #> $oauth_default_id #> NULL #>  #> $oauth_token_header #> [1] "OAuthAccessToken" #>  #> $oauth_fallback_header #> [1] "X-API-Key" #>   # OAuth2 client credentials bunddev_auth_set("berufssprachkurssuche",   type = "oauth2",   oauth_url = "https://rest.arbeitsagentur.de/oauth/gettoken_cc",   env_var = "BERUFSSPRACHKURSSUCHE_API_KEY",   oauth_secret_env = "BERUFSSPRACHKURSSUCHE_CLIENT_SECRET",   oauth_default_id = "bd24f42e-ad0b-4005-b834-23bb6800dc6c") #> $type #> [1] "oauth2" #>  #> $env_var #> [1] "BERUFSSPRACHKURSSUCHE_API_KEY" #>  #> $scheme #> NULL #>  #> $oauth_url #> [1] "https://rest.arbeitsagentur.de/oauth/gettoken_cc" #>  #> $oauth_secret_env #> [1] "BERUFSSPRACHKURSSUCHE_CLIENT_SECRET" #>  #> $oauth_default_id #> [1] "bd24f42e-ad0b-4005-b834-23bb6800dc6c" #>  #> $oauth_token_header #> [1] "OAuthAccessToken" #>  #> $oauth_fallback_header #> [1] "X-API-Key" #>

title: Query Regionalatlas data ‚Äî regionalatlas_query
text: table Table name containing indicators (e.g., "ai002_1_5" population density). See Details common tables. Optional SQL clause filtering. out_fields Fields return (default "*" ). return_geometry Logical; include geometry response. params Additional query parameters. safe Logical; apply throttling caching. refresh Logical; refresh cached responses.

title: Query Regionalatlas data ‚Äî regionalatlas_query
text: tibble regional indicator data.

title: Query Regionalatlas data ‚Äî regionalatlas_query
text: Regionalatlas API provides access 160 regional indicators German statistical offices. Data available various administrative levels (Bundeslaender, Regierungsbezirke, Kreise, Gemeinden). Official docs: https://github.com/bundesAPI/regionalatlas-api. Common tables indicators: ai002_1_5: Population (ai0201=density, ai0202=change, ai0208=foreigners %) ai002_4_5: Age (ai0218=average age, ai0219=mother age 1st child) ai008_1_5: Employment (ai0801=unemployment rate) ai_s_01: Disposable income per capita ai_s_04: SGB-II quota ai017_1: GDP per employee ai005: Federal election results Regional levels data: typ 1=Bundeslaender, 2=Regierungsbezirke, 3=Kreise, 5=Gemeinden. Filter using clause, e.g., = "typ = 1".

title: Query Regionalatlas data ‚Äî regionalatlas_query
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Population density indicators regionalatlas_query("ai002_1_5")  # Filter for Bundeslaender only regionalatlas_query("ai002_1_5", where = "typ = 1")  # Age data for Kreise regionalatlas_query("ai002_4_5", where = "typ = 3") } # }

title: bunddev 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2026-02-13

title: bunddev 0.2.0
text: Fixed response cache collision path-based API calls (dip_bundestag): path included cache key, causing list endpoints return identical data. Fixed dip_bundestag detail endpoints crashing responses mixed-length list fields wrapping list/vector values list-columns. Fixed handelsregister search returning 0 results due missing JSF submit button field (form:btnSuche). Fixed handelsregister false-positive error detection (error-message div always present HTML template).

title: bunddev 0.2.0
text: Expanded dip_bundestag test coverage 16 exported functions. Updated active adapter count 39 33.

title: bunddev 0.2.0
text: Moved 6 adapters inst/dormant/ due upstream issues: interpol: Akamai JavaScript-based bot detection blocks non-browser clients. zoll: Endpoints removed (site redesigned) Radware bot protection. berufssprachkurssuche: Public OAuth2 credentials revoked Bundesagentur fuer Arbeit. coachingangebote: Public OAuth2 credentials revoked Bundesagentur fuer Arbeit. entgeltatlas: Public OAuth2 credentials revoked Bundesagentur fuer Arbeit; confirmed official public API. weiterbildungssuche: Endpoint returns HTTP 403; undocumented internal endpoint revoked credentials.

title: bunddev 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2026-02-08

title: bunddev 0.1.0
text: First public release bunddev - comprehensive R interface German government public sector APIs available bund.dev.

title: bunddev 0.1.0
text: Registry System: Centralized API registry automatic endpoint discovery Core OpenAPI Client: Generic client layer exploring specs making requests Government data (Bundestag, Bundesrat, Bundeshaushalt) Environmental data (DWD weather, Luftqualit√§t, SMARD energy, Pegel water levels) Public services (Jobsuche, Weiterbildungssuche, Ausbildungssuche) Transportation (Autobahn, Ladestationen) Cultural data (Deutsche Digitale Bibliothek, Tagesschau) many (see full list README)

title: bunddev 0.1.0
text: Authentication Support: Flexible authentication system supporting API keys, OAuth2, custom schemes Response Caching: Built-caching reduce API load improve performance Rate Limiting: Configurable rate limiting respect API quotas Tidy Output: adapters return tibbles consistent structure Time Handling: Automatic parsing timestamps POSIXct (Europe/Berlin timezone) Parameter Discovery: Helper functions explore available parameters API Comprehensive Documentation: Vignettes, function documentation, examples included

title: bunddev 0.1.0
text: Fixed R CMD check errors warnings Fixed DDB authentication use correct OAuth format Exported time conversion utilities (bunddev_ms_to_posix(), bunddev_timestamp_to_ms()) Corrected package build configuration

title: bunddev 0.0.0.9000 (Development)
text: Added shared timestamp helpers parsed POSIXct time columns (Europe/Berlin) across SMARD, DWD, Autobahn, Tagesschau adapters. SMARD helpers now accept POSIXct/Date timestamps return parsed time columns series table outputs. DWD helpers add parsed forecast, report, warning time columns; Tagesschau Autobahn helpers add parsed date/time columns. Documented parameter discovery helpers time columns README/vignette adapter helpfiles. Initial package scaffolding registry OpenAPI helpers.
